Comment: This is a game played by two very highly rated players, berserker and harpov, who are now (at the time of annotating) ranked 87th and 1st respectively in Gameknot. This game was, in fact, played in Division A3, the 3rd highest division, of Gameknot's chess league - it seems as though this game is bound to be interesting!

Black now has a solid position, with space for development on the queenside and a well-defended kingside to castle into. Note his well-placed bishops. White has a more open position, also well-developed, and is aiming to open up the centre, develop a bishop and prepare a semi-open file for his kingside rook after castling with 8.f4.

White looks as though he is clearly aiming to attack Black's kingside: perhaps he is aiming for Qg3 Bxh6 and Qxg7  . Black's queen is far away, Black's minor pieces will clearly have trouble mobilising to defend and ...g6 with only lead to more trouble after fxg6. I think this would have won White the game!
